verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had finished <S%G5055><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> sayings, <S%G3056><s%> he departed <S%G3332><s%> from Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the coasts <S%G3725><s%> of Judaea <S%G2449><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> Jordan; <S%G2446><s%>
And great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him; and he healed <S%G2323><s%> them there. <S%G1563><s%>

The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him, tempting <S%G3985><s%> him, and saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> for a man <S%G444><s%> to put <S%G630><s%> away <S%G630><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%> for every <S%G3956><s%> cause? <S%G156><s%>

And he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Have you not read, <S%G314><s%> that he which <S%G3588><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> them at <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> them male <S%G730><s%> and female, <S%G2338><s%>

And said, <S%G2036><s%> For this <S%G5127><s%> cause <S%G1752><s%> shall a man <S%G444><s%> leave <S%G2641><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and mother, <S%G3384><s%> and shall join <S%G4347><s%> to his wife: <S%G1135><s%> and they two <S%G1417><s%> shall be one <S%G3391><s%> flesh? <S%G4561><s%>

Why <S%G5620><s%> they are no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> but one <S%G3391><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has joined <S%G4801><s%> together, <S%G4801><s%> let not man <S%G444><s%> put <S%G5563><s%> asunder. <S%G5563><s%>

They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, Why <S%G5101><s%> did Moses <S%G3475><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> command <S%G1781><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> a writing <S%G975><s%> of divorce, <S%G647><s%> and to put <S%G630><s%> her away? <S%G630><s%>

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Moses <S%G3475><s%> because <S%G4314><s%> of the hardness <S%G4641><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G4641><s%> suffered <S%G2010><s%> you to put <S%G630><s%> away <S%G630><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> wives: <S%G1135><s%> but from the beginning <S%G746><s%> it was not so. <S%G3779><s%>

And I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall put <S%G630><s%> away <S%G630><s%> his wife, <S%G1135><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> it be for fornication, <S%G4202><s%> and shall marry <S%G1060><s%> another, <S%G243><s%> commits <S%G3429><s%> adultery: <S%G3429><s%> and whoever <S%G3588><s%> marries <S%G1060><s%> her which <S%G3588><s%> is put <S%G630><s%> away <S%G630><s%> does commit <S%G3429><s%> adultery. <S%G3429><s%>

His disciples <S%G3101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to him, If <S%G1487><s%> the case <S%G156><s%> of the man <S%G444><s%> be so <S%G3779><s%> with his wife, <S%G1135><s%> it is not good <S%G4851><s%> to marry. <S%G1060><s%>

But he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, All <S%G3956><s%> men cannot <S%G3756><s%> receive <S%G5562><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> save <S%G235><s%> they to whom <S%G3739><s%> it is given. <S%G1325><s%>

For there are some eunuchs, <S%G2135><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> were so <S%G3779><s%> born <S%G1080><s%> from their mother's <S%G3384><s%> womb: <S%G2836><s%> and there are some eunuchs, <S%G2134><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> were made <S%G2134><s%> eunuchs <S%G2134><s%> of men: <S%G444><s%> and there be eunuchs, <S%G2135><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> have made <S%G2134><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> eunuchs <S%G2134><s%> for the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven's <S%G3772><s%> sake. He that is able <S%G1410><s%> to receive <S%G5562><s%> it, let him receive <S%G5562><s%> it.

Then <S%G5119><s%> were there brought <S%G4374><s%> to him little <S%G3813><s%> children, <S%G3813><s%> that he should put <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> them, and pray: <S%G4336><s%> and the disciples <S%G3101><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> them.

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Suffer <S%G863><s%> little <S%G3813><s%> children, <S%G3813><s%> and forbid <S%G2967><s%> them not, to come <S%G2064><s%> to me: for of such <S%G5108><s%> is the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
And he laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> them, and departed <S%G4198><s%> there. <S%G1564><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Good <S%G18><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> good <S%G18><s%> thing shall I do, <S%G4160><s%> that I may have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life? <S%G2222><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Why <S%G5101><s%> call <S%G3004><s%> you me good? <S%G18><s%> there is none <S%G3762><s%> good <S%G18><s%> but one, <S%G1520><s%> that is, God: <S%G2316><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> you will <S%G2309><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> the commandments. <S%G1785><s%>

He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Which? <S%G4169><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> You shall do no <S%G3756><s%> murder, <S%G5407><s%> You shall not commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery, <S%G3431><s%> You shall not steal, <S%G2813><s%> You shall not bear <S%G5576><s%> false <S%G5576><s%> witness, <S%G5576><s%>
Honor <S%G5091><s%> your father <S%G3962><s%> and your mother: <S%G3384><s%> and, You shall love <S%G25><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%>

The young <S%G3495><s%> man <S%G3495><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things have I kept <S%G5442><s%> from my youth <S%G3503><s%> up: what <S%G5101><s%> lack <S%G5302><s%> I yet? <S%G2089><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, If <S%G1487><s%> you will <S%G2309><s%> be perfect, <S%G5046><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> and sell <S%G4453><s%> that you have, <S%G5224><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> to the poor, <S%G4434><s%> and you shall have <S%G2192><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in heaven: <S%G3772><s%> and come <S%G1204><s%> and follow <S%G190><s%> me.

But when the young <S%G3495><s%> man <S%G3495><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that saying, <S%G3056><s%> he went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> sorrowful: <S%G3076><s%> for he had <S%G2258><s%> <S%G2192><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> possessions. <S%G2933><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That a rich <S%G4145><s%> man <S%G3495><s%> shall hardly <S%G1423><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And again <S%G3825><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, It is easier <S%G2123><s%> for a camel <S%G2574><s%> to go <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the eye <S%G5169><s%> of a needle, <S%G4476><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for a rich <S%G4145><s%> man <S%G3495><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

When his disciples <S%G3101><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, they were exceedingly <S%G4970><s%> amazed, <S%G1605><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G686><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> be saved? <S%G4982><s%>

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> beheld <S%G1689><s%> them, and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, With men <S%G444><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is impossible; <S%G102><s%> but with God <S%G2316><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things are possible. <S%G1415><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we have forsaken <S%G863><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> you; what <S%G5101><s%> shall we have <S%G1510><s%> therefore? <S%G686><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That you which <S%G3588><s%> have followed <S%G190><s%> me, in the regeneration <S%G3824><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall sit <S%G2523><s%> in the throne <S%G2362><s%> of his glory, <S%G1391><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> shall sit <S%G2523><s%> on twelve <S%G1427><s%> thrones, <S%G2362><s%> judging <S%G2919><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> tribes <S%G5443><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And every <S%G3956><s%> one that has forsaken <S%G863><s%> houses, <S%G3614><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> sisters, <S%G79><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> father, <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> lands, <S%G68><s%> for my name's <S%G3686><s%> sake, <S%G1752><s%> shall receive <S%G2983><s%> an hundred times, <S%G1542><s%> and shall inherit <S%G2816><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
But many <S%G4183><s%> that are first <S%G4413><s%> shall be last; <S%G2078><s%> and the last <S%G2078><s%> shall be first. <S%G4413><s%>
